Name: NfsMountConfiguration
SummaryComment: Information used to connect to an NFS file system.

Key.Name: Source
Key.SummaryComment: The URI of the file system to mount.

Key.Name: RelativeMountPath
Key.SummaryComment: The relative path on the compute node where the file system will be mounted.
Key.RemarksComment: All file systems are mounted relative to the Batch mounts directory, accessible via the AZ_BATCH_NODE_MOUNTS_DIR environment variable.

Key.Name: MountOptions
Key.SummaryComment: Additional command line options to pass to the mount command.
Key.RemarksComment: These are 'net use' options in Windows and 'mount' options in Linux.
